description:
The seasons go by and the members move on to their second year of high school. However, the new homeroom allocation groups everyone but Mio in the same class. Ritsu teases Mio, who pretends to be fine. Meanwhile, Yui`s younger sister Ui passes her entrance exam and starts at Sakura High. The Light Music Club then sets off to recruit new members, with limited success.
Source: R1 DVD
